Headline: #29 State Temporary Northbound Reroute near State/65th Street
ShortDescription: Northbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Marquette Wentworth, 59th and State: due to, street blockage near State/65th Street.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Marquette Wentworth, 59th and State: due to, street blockage near State/65th Street.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
